plot: Director Mich'ael Zupraner explores his precarious position as an Israeli Jew living in the Palestinian city of Hebron in the West Bank.
title: The Policeman's House
plot_es: Director Mich'ael Zupraner explores his precarious position as an Israeli Jew living in the Palestinian city of Hebron in the West Bank.
plot_en: Director Mich'ael Zupraner explores his precarious position as an Israeli Jew living in the Palestinian city of Hebron in the West Bank.
